Type.BattleDialog: Yes… You can trust me now.
…I hope that your efforts were not in vain.
…Because of me, your existence perishes like a fleeting dream in a drunken haze.
Did you truly think us to be the same as before?
I won’t be bested twice.
I know best what path I must take.
No matter how urgent the situation is, one must avoid following others blindly.
Each memory that flashes before my eyes overwhelms me with grief.
A flower only turns red after the rain has come.
Just don’t have regrets.
Yeah… We couldn’t have gotten to where we are now on our own.
Those who have lost shan’t discuss the art of war!
You may have concealed your head, but your tail was left exposed!
The time has finally come to seize opportunity!
You’ll perish as fire turns to ash.
…You aided me while I was blind, like a chance drifting log that saved a sightless turtle.
I can rest without regret, knowing that you’ll find yourself not so far from me like this…
One cannot expect flowers to bloom from a tree of iron.
You may try and scare me, but I have already set foot on this path. I have nothing to fear!
A broken mirror may not reflect my image in whole, alas…
Is it not human desire to seek what remains of a cherished one, even if their fragments were all there is to be found?
As high as a mountain may be, it ultimately rests beneath the sky.
